name: diskover
description: Diskover is a web-based file system indexer and analytics tool used to scan storage, categorize data, and visualize usage patterns. Itâ€™s popular in media production and enterprise environments for optimizing data storage.
features: Storage Analytics: Visualize disk usage patterns and trends. Understand your data.
File System Indexing: Fast scanning of large storage systems. Comprehensive file discovery.
Data Categorization: Automatically classify files by type and age. Organized insights.
Usage Optimization: Identify wasted space and old files. Reclaim storage efficiently.
Enterprise-Ready: Built for media production and large environments. Scales to petabytes.
Self-Hosted: Keep storage analytics data private. Your files, your insights.
